metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10913 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Symfony before 2.7.51, 2.8.x before 2.8.50, 3.x before 3.4.26, 4.x before 4.1.12, and 4.2.x before 4.2.7, HTTP Methods provided as verbs or using the override header may be treated as trusted input, but they are not validated, possibly causing SQL injection or XSS. This is related to symfony/http-foundation.

criterions.comment: symfony package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
